greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Chebyshev polynomials of the second kind, U(n,x)^2, evaluated at x = sqrt(3)/2.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-2,1).
formula: a(n) = a(-2-n) = a(n+6) for all n in Z.
Sum_{n>=0} a(n)/(n+1)*x^(n+1) = log(1-x+x^2)-2*log(1-x) for -1 < x < 1. - _Werner Schulte_, Jul 10 2017
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x) / ((1 - x) (1 - x + x^2)), {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 14 2017 *)
program: (MAGMA) m:=60; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!((1+x)/((1-x)*(1-x+x^2)))); // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 03 2018
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Feb 07 2015
